name: Legend of Steel
overview:
The world has been ransacked for hundreds of years by terrible demons, known as Delorians, who have appeared from the depths of ancient dungeons. During the course of this dark age, an endless fierce battle has been fought between humans and Delorians.

Legend of Steel is an action and dungeon exploration game compatible with all Amstrad CPC models, where we will have to fight with countless enemies, find keys to open doors, obtain gold and, with our skill, manage to find the hidden camera where it is hiding. the secret of the immortality of the Delorians.
